title: 09/22 Fantasy Football Podcast: LAR-SF, Start or Sit Week 3
description:
Week 3 is off to an awesome start after a Thursday night bonanza! Will we continue to see great offense this week? We begin by breaking down last night's game and wondering if it's time to sell Todd Gurley (3:14), Sammy Watkins (9:15) or Carlos Hyde (10:50) ... We give you some Week 3 sleepers (20:40) and play Beat the Waiver Wire (22:12) before getting into every game ... OAK-WAS (24:28), KC-LAC (31:40), TB-MIN (36:00), SEA-TEN (42:40), NO-CAR (46:19), CIN-GB (50:54), DAL-ARI (55:40), BAL-JAC (1:00:16), CLE-IND (1:02:30), ATL-DET (1:03:35), DEN-BUF (1:05:48), HOU-NE (1:08:23), MIA-NYJ (1:12:20), NYG-PHI (1:13:36), PIT-CHI (1:15:43) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
